name: muhttpd
short_description: muhttpd is a simple but complete web server written in portable ANSI C, supporting logging, CGI scripts, MIME type based handlers, and HTTPS. It has been tested on various Unix environments on 32-bit, 64-bit, little endian and big endian systems.
